titles.title: American Samoa Study Commission Act
To establish the American Samoa Study Commission.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee On Insular and International Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. American Samoa Study Commission Act - Establishes the American Samoa Study Commission to study and report on all factors that led to American Samoa's historical and present political status and relationship with the United States. Authorizes appropriations.
